article.name: mindlink
article.contents:
--- class: Psion name: Mindlink title: Mindlink school: Telepathy rank: 1 type: Enhancement, Defense, Utility brief: Link two minds together compact: at-will, swift, ranged, concentration; you link two minds, who can thus forth communicate telepathically. At rank 2, you can spread the network to yourself plus your proficiency bonus in targets, and targets gain a reaction to offer their own int/wis/cha save to replace an ally's failed one, and can choose to absorb an equal share of an ally's psychic damage. At rank 3, allies can grant knowledge of a power to an ally. ---
# Inception
Base level: link two minds together so you can telepathically communicate.
Advanced uses: share mental abilities (like spells and knowledge), reinforce each others' mental saving throws, combat each others' mental effects, share the burden of psychic damage, etc. Also, link more than 2 minds in a network.
